requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500, GeForce 720,or Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
